--- category: release-notes version: 2.10.8 title: Colors Updated For Contrast breaking-changes: potential-breaking-changes: release-notes: - Changed `$fill-pink` from `#f43192` to `#e40c78` - Changed `$text-promoted-orange` from `#f7ad19` to `#bf5608` - Changed `$fill-teal` from `#0dccb0` to `#007c7c` - Changed `$text-gray-lightest from `#999999` to `#757575` ---
